column6: The grand adaptation of Jane Austen's masterpiece continues! The Bennet girls are going boy-crazy in a sea of officers and wealthy businessmen. What's a lady got to do to find a good man? Brought to you by award-winning writer NANCY BUTLER and fan-favorite HUGO PETRUS! Rated T  ...$3.99
